afterClose.description: Callbacks after Modal is completely closed
afterClose.type: Modal 完全关闭后的回调
afterClose.description_zh: Modal 完全关闭后的回调

closeIcon.description: Customize the close icon. 5.7.0: Hide the close button when set to 'null' or 'false'
closeIcon.type: 自定义关闭图标。5.7.0：设置为 null 或 false 时隐藏关闭按钮
closeIcon.description_zh: 自定义关闭图标。5.7.0：设置为 `null` 或 `false` 时隐藏关闭按钮

destroyOnClose.description: Destroys the child elements in the modal when closed
destroyOnClose.type: 关闭时销毁 Modal 里的子元素
destroyOnClose.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Modal 里的子元素

focusTriggerAfterClose.description: Whether the trigger element needs to be focused after the dialog is closed
focusTriggerAfterClose.type: 对话框关闭后是否需要聚焦触发元素
focusTriggerAfterClose.description_zh: 对话框关闭后是否需要聚焦触发元素

footer.description: Bottom content, when the default bottom button is not needed, can be set to 'footer={null}'
footer.type: 底部内容，当不需要默认底部按钮时，可以设为 footer={null}
footer.description_zh: 底部内容，当不需要默认底部按钮时，可以设为 `footer={null}`

getContainer.description: Specifies the node to be mounted by Modal, but it is still displayed in full screen, and 'false' is mounted at the current location
getContainer.type: 指定 Modal 挂载的节点，但依旧为全屏展示，false 为挂载在当前位置
getContainer.description_zh: 指定 Modal 挂载的节点，但依旧为全屏展示，`false` 为挂载在当前位置

keyboard.description: Whether the keyboard ESC is supported
keyboard.type: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭
keyboard.description_zh: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

maskClosable.description: Click whether the mask is allowed to be turned off
maskClosable.type: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭

style.description: It can be used to set the style of the floating layer, adjust the position of the floating layer, and so on
style.type: 可用于设置浮层的样式，调整浮层位置等
style.description_zh: 可用于设置浮层的样式，调整浮层位置等

open.description: Whether the dialog box is visible

wrapClassName.description: The class name of the outer container of the dialog box
wrapClassName.type: 对话框外层容器的类名
wrapClassName.description_zh: 对话框外层容器的类名

afterOpenChange.description: The callback after the animation ends when Modal is turned on and off
afterOpenChange.type: 打开和关闭 Modal 时动画结束后的回调
afterOpenChange.description_zh: 打开和关闭 Modal 时动画结束后的回调

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Click the callback of the mask layer or the top right cross or cancel button
events.params: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调
events.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调
